# iosxr_performance_measurement (Resource)

This resource can manage the Performance Measurement configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_performance_measurement" "example" {
  source_address_ipv4                                                          = "10.1.1.1"
  source_address_ipv6                                                          = "2001:db8::1"
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_querier_dst_port      = 862
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_querier_src_port      = 10000
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv4_timestamp1_label = 1000
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv4_timestamp2_label = 2000
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv6_timestamp1_label = 1500
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv6_timestamp2_label = 2500
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_prefixes = [
    {
      address = "10.1.0.0"
      length  = 24
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_addresses = [
    {
      address = "10.1.1.100"
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_prefixes = [
    {
      address = "2001:db8:1:1::"
      length  = 64
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_addresses = [
    {
      address = "2001:db8::100"
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_prefixes = [
    {
      address = "10.2.0.0"
      length  = 24
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_addresses = [
    {
      address = "10.2.1.100"
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_prefixes = [
    {
      address = "2001:db8:1:2::"
      length  = 64
    }
  ]
  protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_addresses = [
    {
      address = "2001:db8::100"
    }
  ]
  path_tracing                        = true
  path_tracing_timestamp_template_st0 = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `path_tracing` (Boolean) Enable path-tracing and enter its submode
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st0` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [8:15]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st1` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [12:19]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st2` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [16:23]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st3` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [20:27]
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_addresses` (Attributes List) Configure IPv4 address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_addresses))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_prefixes` (Attributes List) Configure IPv4 prefixes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv4_prefixes))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_addresses` (Attributes List) Configure IPv6 address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_addresses))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_prefixes` (Attributes List) Configure IPv6 prefixes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_querier_allow_responder_ipv6_prefixes))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_addresses` (Attributes List) Configure IPv4 address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_addresses))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_prefixes` (Attributes List) Configure IPv4 prefix (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv4_prefixes))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_addresses` (Attributes List) Configure IPv6 address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_addresses))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_prefixes` (Attributes List) Configure IPv6 prefixes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_responder_allow_querier_ipv6_prefixes))
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv4_timestamp1_label` (Number) label
  - Range: `256`-`23999`
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv4_timestamp2_label` (Number) label
  - Range: `256`-`23999`
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv6_timestamp1_label` (Number) label
  - Range: `256`-`23999`
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_ipv6_timestamp2_label` (Number) label
  - Range: `256`-`23999`
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_querier_dst_port` (Number) Port number
  - Range: `862`-`862`
- `protocol_twamp_light_measurement_delay_unauthenticated_querier_src_port` (Number) UDP port opened on Route Processor to be used as source port in queries
  - Range: `1024`-`14999`
- `source_address_ipv4` (String) IPv4 endpoint
- `source_address_ipv6` (String) IPv6 endpoint

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_performance_measurement.example ""
```
